messages.msgSnippet: Bob Burke mentioned the forthcoming ... From: burker1@aol.com To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com Sent: Sunday, November 16, 2003 4:08 AM Subject:
messages.messageBody:
Bob Burke mentioned the "forthcoming"
----- Original Message -----
From: burker1@...
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, November 16, 2003 4:08 AM
Subject: [samuraihistory] Osprey Campaign Book - Kawanakajima


I've just learned that Osprey has published a new Campaign book on
Kawanakajima (1553-1564).

It's by Stephen Turnbull, so I'm assuming it's about Japan (correct me if I'm
wrong).

Has anyone read it? How is it? Was this the last of the Medieval Japanese
battles or the first of the Renaissnace battles in Japan?

Bob Burke

Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
